location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no.48 of 1853 from Captain Arnold Kemball, Resident in the Persian Gulf, to Arthur Malet, Chief Secretary of the Government of Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is a covering letter, enclosing a letter to Kemball’s address from Lieutenant-Colonel Justin Sheil, Her Majesty's Minister Plenipotentiary and Envoy Extraordinary at the Court of Persia, dated 20 December 1852. Sheil’s letter relates to import duties paid by British subjects on merchandise imported by them in Dutch and other foreign vessels.
